name: imageAddBorder
description: Adds a rectangular border around the outside edge of a ColdFusion image.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: thickness
params.description: Thickness of the border in pixels. The default value is 1. The border is added to the outside edge of the image; the image area is increased accordingly.

params.name: color
params.description: Only valid if the borderType is not specified or if borderType = 'constant'.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: Draw a green border around the outside edge of the red border.

examples.description: Add a 50-pixel-wide border to the outside edge of the image that is a tiled version of the image itself.
